Articles.Content:
Hello guys i'm working on a mod but after a few hours of work I still don't even have a start of the models I was wondering if someone could help me with it.

Edited February 2, 2016 by Koeing-Kairbus
Share some details! Do you need help modeling on your own, or do you need some one to make some models for you?

Sorry if i was to unclear I need someone who could make some models for me. I will make designs en deliver information to the person who makes the models for me. Because I know what i want to make en some of the details there's just the problem that i suck at 3D modelling.

and maybe it's a good idea to tell what I want models for. I wanna make a mod for a modular 737 aircraft. My idea was to split the aircraft in it's component's: nosecone, cockpit, passenger module, horizontal stabiliser, vertical stabilisers, wing, flaps, slats, winglet's, engine mount's and engines.

If someone is interested in working with me on this project please let me know.
